name: The Garbage Trials
description:
The Chore Gods call upon you to take out the trash. Are you up for the challenge?

The Garbage Trials is a short game where you have to take your trash to the end of an obstacle course to put it into your trash can.

   |CONTROLSl

/--------------------\

W,A,S,D to move.

"E" to interact

Left Click to grab

\--------------------/

(this was made specifically for the low effort jam 20 so expect some messiness here & there!)
